name: component-form-builder
description: Multi-step form system with per-step Zod validation, field type rendering, and step progress indicator
postMessage:
Form builder installed!

Usage:
import { FormBuilder } from '@/components/form-builder'
import { z } from 'zod'

const steps = [
  {
    title: 'Personal Info',
    fields: [
      { name: 'name', label: 'Full Name', type: 'text' },
      { name: 'email', label: 'Email', type: 'email' },
    ],
    schema: z.object({ name: z.string().min(1), email: z.string().email() }),
  },
]

<FormBuilder steps={steps} onSubmit={async (data) => console.log(data)} />

Requires shadcn/ui: npx shadcn@latest add button input textarea select checkbox card label form
